features: Premium thermal hood is adjustable 2-ways and crafted with down-fill for added softness and warmth around the head and neck. The interior down-filled brim can be cinched around the face to block out cold and wind, while still maintaining exterior hood shape and without blocking line of vision. Snaps allow exterior brim to be secured back away from face for added visibility
Durability Mapping: High-abrasion areas are reinforced with Cordura® fabric for added durability
Reflectivity: Signature double-stripe reflective details at back of hood for added visibility in low light
Interior backpack straps allow jacket to be carried hands-free over the shoulders
Down-filled placket with hidden snap closures over 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
Recessed Power Stretch® cuffs with thumbhole construction add comfort and lock in heat
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
4 exterior pockets: 2 fleece-lined hand warmer pockets, 2 lower pockets with fleece lining at knuckle side and flap closures. All pockets have hidden snap closures
3 interior pockets: security pocket with zipper closure, 2 mesh drop-in pockets
